thread.title: BRIEF-Harbin Gong Da High-tech Enterprise Development receives administrative order

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Harbin Gong Da High-tech Enterprise Development receives administrative order

organizations.name: harbin gong da high-tech enterprise development co ltd
heilongjiang regulatory bureau of china securities regulatory commission

text:
Jan 19 (Reuters) - Harbin Gong Da High-tech Enterprise Development Co Ltd :
* Says it received an administrative order from Heilongjiang Regulatory Bureau of China Securities Regulatory Commission on Jan. 17, regarding violation of information disclosure related regulations
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/Wq1cc7
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
